mapper.select: select * from T_EXECUTE_RESULT where id in (select id from (SELECT id FROM T_EXECUTE_RESULT where id BETWEEN #{id1} and #{id2}) AS temp)
select * from T_EXECUTE_RESULT where busi_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}
select DISTINCT fund_account_id,trade_account_id,client_id from T_EXECUTE_RESULT where encrypt_lable = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE T_EXECUTE_RESULT A INNER JOIN TER_encrypt_temp B ON A.fund_account_id = B.TER_B_fundaccountId and A.trade_account_id = B.TER_B_tradeaccountId and A.client_id = B.TER_B_clientId SET A.fund_account_id=B.TER_A_fundaccountId,A.trade_account_id=B.TER_A_tradeaccountId,A.client_id=B.TER_A_clientId,A.encrypt_lable=1 WHERE A.encrypt_lable=0 and A.id IN (SELECT id FROM (SELECT id FROM T_EXECUTE_RESULT where id BETWEEN #{id1} and #{id2}) AS temp)

UPDATE T_EXECUTE_RESULT A inner join TER_encrypt_temp B ON A.fund_account_id = B.TER_B_fundaccountId and A.trade_account_id = B.TER_B_tradeaccountId and A.client_id = B.TER_B_clientId SET A.fund_account_id=B.TER_A_fundaccountId,A.trade_account_id=B.TER_A_tradeaccountId,A.client_id=B.TER_A_clientId,A.encrypt_lable=1 where A.id in (select id from (select id from T_EXECUTE_RESULT where encrypt_lable=0) AS temp)
mapper.select: select count(*) from T_EXECUTE_RESULT where busi_date = DATE_FORMAT((CURDATE() - interval 1 day),"%Y%m%d")
